A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The cinematics were great and the story in itself was good. But I completely felt cheated. The Force Awakens gave us many questions that were just squandered away. I felt like this was a total cop-out. I would love for Disney to do a re-do of the Last Jedi before moving on to Ep.9. Ugh\, why am I alway let down by studios.
